participant_1.background:
I'm glad I have such fond memories of fishing with my dad.
i can t live without my friends.
i teach kindergarten.
I would not be able to be a personal trainer if I were blind because I would not be able to see my clients' form and correct them.
I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to miss the sun and the beach, but I'm ready to focus on my studies.
my favorite food is strawberries.
I spend my day learning about personal finance and investing while watching Star Wars.
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.
i am trying to open my own teaching program for horse racing.

content.text: Good! I'm excited to start my studies. What do you do for a living?
I'm a kindergarten teacher. I love my job, but it can be hectic.
I bet! I'm not sure what I want to do with my life yet. I'm thinking about going into personal finance.
That's cool! I'm not very good with money, so I could use some help in that area.
I'm sure I could help you out with that! I love learning about personal finance and investing.
That's great! I'm glad you're so passionate about it.
Thanks! I'm also trying to open my own teaching program for horse racing.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to ride horses.
Maybe I could give you some lessons!
That would be great! I'd love to learn more about horse racing.
Great! I'll DM you my number.
Perfect! I'll send you a message later.
